name: actions_get-custom-oidc-sub-claim-for-repo
description:
Gets the customization template for an OpenID Connect (OIDC) subject claim.
You must authenticate using an access token with the `repo` scope to use this
endpoint. GitHub Apps must have the `organization_administration:read` permission to use this endpoint.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

$block.$h1: Actions OIDC subject customization for a repository

$block: Actions OIDC subject customization for a repository

$ul: **include_claim_keys**: Array of unique strings. Each claim key can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores.
**use_default**: Whether to use the default template or not. If `true`, the `include_claim_keys` field is ignored.
